title: New law increases penalties for assaulting a T worker
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News Transit employees will soon have some extra protection against aggressive passengers.
A new Massachusetts law that goes into effect next year strengthens protections for public transit workers amid a steep rise in assaults, state officials announced.
Gov.

title: How a model’s work affects her dating life
author: Meredith Goldstein
bullets: Love Letters This week's Love Letters podcast guest — a part-time model — doesn't want to quit her job to find a healthy relationship.

title: Jaylen Brown scores 30 as Celtics blow out Lakers for fourth straight win: 8 takeaways
author: Tom Westerholm
bullets: Boston Celtics The Celtics are a flawed roster from a construction standpoint, but there’s nothing particularly confusing about why they are winning games.
Jaylen Brown led the Celtics in scoring with yet another 30-point outing to go with eight rebounds and eight assists.

title: Roman Anthony reflects on his rookie season, names veteran players he leaned on
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: Boston Red Sox “I think that was the most important part for me, was just learning all that I needed to do and taking that into the offseason and applying that to next year.

title: Rumored Red Sox target Joe Ryan reportedly won’t be traded by Twins this offseason
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Boston Red Sox The Red Sox pursued Ryan ahead of the trade deadline this past season, but were turned down by the Twins.
Joe Ryan was named an All-Star with the Twins last season.
(AP Photo/Mike Stewart) By Conor Roche December 5, 2025 | 4:30 PM 2 minutes to read The Red Sox can cross one name off their offseason wishlist.

title: 27-year-old Taunton man to face animal cruelty charge over underfed dog
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime The dog, a severely malnourished puppy named Sprout, was discovered during a routine traffic stop.
Sprout arrived “severely emaciated" and required a blood transfusion and hospitalization, according to the Animal Protection Center of Southeastern Massachusetts.

Animal Protection Center of Southeastern Massachusetts By Abby Patkin December 5, 2025 | 3:38 PM 2 minutes to read Police in West Bridgewater are looking to charge a 27-year-old man with animal cruelty after an officer discovered a severely malnourished dog in his car during a routine traffic stop.
